note.p: Birth: Kilkenny, County Kilkenny, Ireland (04 August 1800)
Death: His residence at Rathmines, Dublin, Ireland (19 September 1878)

Career: Invented a machine engraving, printing and numbering bank notes; constructed reflecting telescopes including the 'Great Melbourne Telescope'; Engineer to the Bank of Ireland; retired from business (1868)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; DSB; Irish Innovators
